pullRequest.title: Update examples
pullRequest.bodyText:
Eliminate use of some deprecated methods
MP: Use built-in io.helidon.microprofile.cdi.Main when custom Main not needed
MP: remove Application classes when not needed
Remove reference to JDK8 from READMEs
Other fixes

commit.message:
Update examples to get rid of deprecated methods.
Don't use Application classes when not needed
Remove references to JDK8 in readmes
And other minor changes

nodes.bodyText: The message is wrong - this uses the MP Config, not Helidon config
This main class seems to be useless.
